metadata.title: CVE-2023-0590 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
A use-after-free flaw was found in qdisc_graft in net/sched/sch_api.c inthe Linux Kernel due to a race problem. This flaw leads to a denial ofservice issue. If patch ebda44da44f6 ("net: sched: fix race condition inqdisc_graft()") not applied yet, then kernel could be affected.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-0590` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.15.0-60-generic - 5.15.0-60.66
linux-image-5.15.0-60-generic-lpae - 5.15.0-60.66
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-60-generic - 5.15.0-60.66
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-60-generic-64k - 5.15.0-60.66
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1028-kvm - 5.15.0-1028.33
No subscription required

No subscription required

No subscription required
